title: BRIEF-Hecla Reports Q4 Adj EPS Of $0.04
text: February 15, 2018 / 8:17 AM / Updated 21 minutes ago BRIEF-Hecla Reports Q4 Adj EPS Of $0.04 Reuters Staff Feb 15 (Reuters) - Hecla Mining Co: * HECLA REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS * QTRLY SALES $160.11 MILLION VERSUS $164.25 MILLION * ‍CASH, CASH EQUIVALENTS AND SHORT-TERM INVESTMENTS OF APPROXIMATELY $220 MILLION AT YEAR END, AN INCREASE OF ABOUT $21 MILLION​ * QTRLY LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * QTRLY GOLD PRODUCTION 60,964 OUNCES VERSUS 63,150 OUNCES‍​ * QTRLY DILUTED ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER COMMON SHARE $0.04 * ‍SEES 2018E CAPITAL EXPENDITURES (EXCLUDING CAPITALIZED INTEREST) $95-$105 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ( Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com )
